name: 3D Figure
content: Create a 1/7 scale commercialized figurine of the character in the picture, full-body glossy plastic face figurine with visible articulated knee, elbow, neck joints, designed in the style of a manufactured collectible plastic toy. The figurine should have the texture, finish, and detailing typical of high-quality PVC/ABS anime figures, smooth surfaces, painted highlights, and slightly stylized proportions, avoiding photorealistic skin or materials. The figurine is displayed on a computer desk, mounted on a round transparent acrylic base. On the nearby computer screen, show the 3D modeling process of this figurine. Next to the screen, include a toy packaging box designed in the style of premium collectible merchandise, printed with original artwork. The packaging is a BANDAl-style toy packaging box printed with the original artwork and the name of the character. The room is a well lit warm and cozy environment with natural light from window, high quality bright cinematic lighting, resembling a premium product photography.

name: Watercolor Painting
content: A vibrant watercolor painting of the character in the image. The style should be loose and expressive, with visible brushstrokes and bleeding colors. The background should be a simple wash of complementary colors.

name: Kawaii Sticker
content: A cute "kawaii" style sticker of the character in the image. The design should feature bold, clean outlines, simple cel-shading, and large, expressive eyes. The character should have a cheerful expression. The final image should have a white die-cut border around it, as if it were a real sticker.

name: The Sims 4 CAS
content: Take the provided photo and render it inside the exact Create-A-Sim (CAS) interface from The Sims 4. Show the person as a 3D character standing in the futuristic pod with a glowing base. Place the bright sims green diamond above their head. On the left side, reproduce the full Sims 4 CAS sidebar with tabs for Body, Hair, Clothing, Accessories, Personality, etc. Include outfit thumbnails, sliders with green bars, and dropdown menus exactly as they appear in the game. At the bottom right, display the large green checkmark button with 'Play' inside. Maintain the Sims 4 font, colors, and UI layout so it looks identical to an in-game screenshot.

name: Polaroid Photo
content: Create an image taken with a Polaroid camera. DO NOT CHANGE THE FACES AT ALL. The photo should look like a regular photo, without clear subjects or props. The photo should have a slight blur effect and a consistent light source, like a flash from a dark room, spread throughout the photo. DO NOT CHANGE THE FACES AT ALL. Replace the background behind with white curtains. If there are multiple people in the image they people should be hugging each other with smiles, looking very happy. Single people should be posing to the camera happily. Subtle instant-film imperfections visible: light grain, soft vignette, faint light leak. Bright yet natural tones, cinematic detail, authentic romantic moment frozen in an instant-photo style. Do not add any text on the photo.
